businessProfile.name: FAR EAST PIZZA CO
businessProfile.address: 2023 W McDermott Dr Suite No 220, Plano, TX 75025, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 2023 W McDermott Dr Suite No 220, Plano, TX 75025, USA

reviews.text:
Great food. Don‚Äôt judge this place by its location; judge it by the amazing food because it is hands-down phenomenal, rich, and familiar all at the same time. It is so hard for us to find places with good North Indian flavors in the Frisco/Plano/Allen area but this place finally meets and SURPASSES all expectations! Plus, Indian AND Italian? Sign me up, I will ignore all my GI issues for this restaurant.

We ordered the Tropical Indian Pizza (mom wanted pineapples) and the Rigatoni Pasta (I wanted pasta). For the pizza, you can choose between Naan or Flatbread - we went with the Naan. The Executive Chef personally took our order and even accommodated all of our required substitutions (ordered minimal cheese on the pizza and that was accommodated to reduce my mom‚Äôs migraines). Huge plus!

Food: 8.5/10

The pasta with halal chicken was superb. The naan-based pizza was flavorful, and the pineapples were juicy and well-balanced as part of the Tropical flavors. Personally, I prefer a thicker crust, so the thinness and hard crispiness of the naan pizza wasn‚Äôt quite to my liking ‚Äî the only reason this isn't a full 10. Also, I would have preferred a bit more spice in both dishes, but since this was my first time, I didn't know how spicey the original would be. Now I know what to customize for next time (pizza texture and spice levels).

Ambience: 9/10

We came in during a quiet late afternoon, so we had the entire place to ourselves. That worked in our favor ‚Äî the Executive Chef had time to chat and share her inspiring journey in opening the restaurant and launching her catering business. The decor all around was very eye-catching and beautiful - there was a rhythm to the whole place, and the music in the background was also pleasant and not too loud as to be distracting. A memorable and meaningful experience - it was a lovely, illuminating conversation.

Final thoughts:

Come hungry. Come curious. And come with an open mind. You will not leave disappointed ‚Äî In Sha Allah!

Amazing! Went in on Sunday, April 6th 2025, 3:30PM. I ordered the veggie pizza and the toppings along with crust were delicious!  All toppings were fresh, flavorful and expertly crisped. The ripe tomatoes, asiago cheese, pesto, paneer and naan crust were the standout items (for me).

Additionally, the lady at the front brought my pizza out to the car‚Äîwhich was courteous for my takeout order. I‚Äôll be back. The food is so tasty and the hands of the cooks are blessed! Please come check them out, y‚Äôall!

Hubby and I went to Far East Pizza and it was honestly really good. We got the Chicken Tikka Naan Pizza and a large Veggie flatbread, both came out hot and fresh, which was awesome. The Chicken Tikka one had a really nice flavor, kind of spicy but not too much, and the naan crust made it super different (in a good way).

The service was great too. Our waitress was super nice and kept checking in to make sure we were good, which I appreciated. The decor inside was nice, not too fancy, but definitely clean and put together.

Also, the prices were actually decent, especially compared to other spots that serve fusion style food like this. Overall, I‚Äôd definitely recommend trying it out if you haven‚Äôt already!

Literally some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in Dallas. Yall need to get here asap! The crust is light and crisp but still has a chew to it. Its super cheesy too. Great prices and they have a happy hour everyday! I will be coming back here daily ü§†

We came here not knowing the pizza was Indian inspired and it turned out to be a delightful surprise. We ordered the chicken tikka skewers, tropical chicken pizza, and the butter chicken curry. The skewers were very well seasoned and chicken was tender and delicious. The pizza was very good and it had a pleasant kick with the curry pizza sauce and jalape√±os, such a great combination. The chicken curry came with rice and naan and it was good. The service was excellent and we did not wait long for the food to come out. I would definitely come back to this place.

recentReviews.text: We cannot express how grateful and thankful we are for you all. We had catering done for our wedding and gender reveal and absolutely consider this place to be very special to us. Food was amazing and both owners and staff went above and beyond for us. Thank you again!
Very good pizza! Staff is very nice and the place is very clean. They also offer tiffin catering which tastes great and is a very good price!

Drove over 45 minutes on a quest to try new pizza, and man, I was impressed! This pizza is a 10/10 and worth every minute getting there! The Flatbread and Naan crusts were crunchy and tasty. The pizza toppings were delicious and well balanced in flavors. Ended up ordering 3 pizzas and a dessert so I can stock up at home.  Would highly recommend to ANYONE who is even slightly interested in great pizza. Incredibly friendly service!
Staff is very kind and food is excellent

Ordered chicken tikka pizza and veggie spectacular. Loved the veggie spectacular and 2 * rating is for that and chicken tikka pizza chicken was rancid(cooked multiple times smell)..can‚Äôt believe I spend $22 on it‚Ä¶would recommend to try veggie but not chicken. Disappointed!!

Good Pizza üëçüèº
Good Service üëçüèº
Did not disappoint üôå üëè üëåüèº

detailedReviews.author: Yessenia Puga
detailedReviews.text: We cannot express how grateful and thankful we are for you all. We had catering done for our wedding and gender reveal and absolutely consider this place to be very special to us. Food was amazing and both owners and staff went above and beyond for us. Thank you again!

detailedReviews.author: Avneesh
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza! Staff is very nice and the place is very clean. They also offer tiffin catering which tastes great and is a very good price!

detailedReviews.author: Kara Black
detailedReviews.text: Drove over 45 minutes on a quest to try new pizza, and man, I was impressed! This pizza is a 10/10 and worth every minute getting there! The Flatbread and Naan crusts were crunchy and tasty. The pizza toppings were delicious and well balanced in flavors. Ended up ordering 3 pizzas and a dessert so I can stock up at home.  Would highly recommend to ANYONE who is even slightly interested in great pizza. Incredibly friendly service!

detailedReviews.author: James Carter
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service!

detailedReviews.author: steven stewart
detailedReviews.text: Staff is very kind and food is excellent

detailedReviews.author: saikumar nalla
detailedReviews.text: Ordered chicken tikka pizza and veggie spectacular. Loved the veggie spectacular and 2 * rating is for that and chicken tikka pizza chicken was rancid(cooked multiple times smell)..can‚Äôt believe I spend $22 on it‚Ä¶would recommend to try veggie but not chicken. Disappointed!!

detailedReviews.author: Orlando -
detailedReviews.text:
Good Pizza üëçüèº
Good Service üëçüèº
Did not disappoint üôå üëè üëåüèº

detailedReviews.author: John Cleaver
detailedReviews.text:
The food and Indian flare on pizza is wonderful.
Super polite and attentive service.

detailedReviews.author: ALGCC Calendar
detailedReviews.text: Our lunch experience exceeded expectations. There is a lot of "Indian fusion" going on locally, but this was very nice and more elevated than other things we've tried. The food was delicious, the restaurant itself very nice, and the price very reasonable for the quantity and quality. Chicken meatballs, Far East Veggie Spectacular pizza and Beef Sausage and Beef Pepperoni pizza were all excellent. We will be back.  The location is a liability, so if you like it, speak up!

detailedReviews.author: Nitin Sharma
detailedReviews.text: Overall all good has good taste, but is pricey for the quantity. Attached picture is of butter chicken dish for $16. Not worth it in my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: Travis Hughey
detailedReviews.text: Great server team and the pizza and wings are great!

detailedReviews.author: maya
detailedReviews.text: Far East Pizza Co. was absolutely excellent! I got the Tropical Chicken Pizza on naan, the Butter Chicken Pizza on naan, and the Pomegranate Chili Chicken Wings. Everything was very well priced and more importantly delicious. I am Desi myself, and have been averse to fusion cuisine for a long time, but Chef Nidhi knocked it out of the park! The sandwiches are equally amazing, I've gotten the Ultimate Delhi Sandwich before and I will be back for it next time I'm in the area. Please check this lovely place out!

detailedReviews.author: Jenn
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food that hit both pizza craving and indian food craving. We ordered the butter chicken pizza(our favorite!), tropical paneer pizza, and hello dahli salad. We will be back to try the veggie spectacular pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Moniece G
detailedReviews.text:
Hubby and I went to Far East Pizza and it was honestly really good. We got the Chicken Tikka Naan Pizza and a large Veggie flatbread, both came out hot and fresh, which was awesome. The Chicken Tikka one had a really nice flavor, kind of spicy but not too much, and the naan crust made it super different (in a good way).

The service was great too. Our waitress was super nice and kept checking in to make sure we were good, which I appreciated. The decor inside was nice, not too fancy, but definitely clean and put together.

Also, the prices were actually decent, especially compared to other spots that serve fusion style food like this. Overall, I‚Äôd definitely recommend trying it out if you haven‚Äôt already!

detailedReviews.author: Xiangchen
detailedReviews.text: Great food with reasonable price. Menu is perfect for someone who loves Indian flavors but cannot handle strong spices. Our little one loves the salad and pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Brown
detailedReviews.text: This establishment provided an exceptional customer service experience, with outstanding food quality and fresh ingredients. My children were particularly impressed, eagerly anticipating our next visit. It stands out as a hidden gem in the competitive pizza industry.

detailedReviews.author: Aliza Siddiqui
detailedReviews.text:
Great food. Don‚Äôt judge this place by its location; judge it by the amazing food because it is hands-down phenomenal, rich, and familiar all at the same time. It is so hard for us to find places with good North Indian flavors in the Frisco/Plano/Allen area but this place finally meets and SURPASSES all expectations! Plus, Indian AND Italian? Sign me up, I will ignore all my GI issues for this restaurant.

We ordered the Tropical Indian Pizza (mom wanted pineapples) and the Rigatoni Pasta (I wanted pasta). For the pizza, you can choose between Naan or Flatbread - we went with the Naan. The Executive Chef personally took our order and even accommodated all of our required substitutions (ordered minimal cheese on the pizza and that was accommodated to reduce my mom‚Äôs migraines). Huge plus!

Food: 8.5/10

The pasta with halal chicken was superb. The naan-based pizza was flavorful, and the pineapples were juicy and well-balanced as part of the Tropical flavors. Personally, I prefer a thicker crust, so the thinness and hard crispiness of the naan pizza wasn‚Äôt quite to my liking ‚Äî the only reason this isn't a full 10. Also, I would have preferred a bit more spice in both dishes, but since this was my first time, I didn't know how spicey the original would be. Now I know what to customize for next time (pizza texture and spice levels).

Ambience: 9/10

We came in during a quiet late afternoon, so we had the entire place to ourselves. That worked in our favor ‚Äî the Executive Chef had time to chat and share her inspiring journey in opening the restaurant and launching her catering business. The decor all around was very eye-catching and beautiful - there was a rhythm to the whole place, and the music in the background was also pleasant and not too loud as to be distracting. A memorable and meaningful experience - it was a lovely, illuminating conversation.

Final thoughts:

Come hungry. Come curious. And come with an open mind. You will not leave disappointed ‚Äî In Sha Allah!

detailedReviews.author: Avi Shafir
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful place! They got everything right!! The pizza was something else delicious and unique. The waitress was fantastic. The atmosphere is great! I'll be back 100%.

detailedReviews.author: Yuva ‚ÄúYunadoof‚Äù Chitturi
detailedReviews.text: Food was great, pasta needed a little more seasoning, but pizza was top notch, staff were amazing, atmosphere was great, overall an astounding visit.

detailedReviews.author: Jesus Siqueiros
detailedReviews.text: Literally some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in Dallas. Yall need to get here asap! The crust is light and crisp but still has a chew to it. Its super cheesy too. Great prices and they have a happy hour everyday! I will be coming back here daily ü§†

detailedReviews.author: Kristina T
detailedReviews.text: Got the butter chicken pizza, tikka tok pasta and the hello dahli chopped salad. Pizza came out hot and the flavor of the butter chicken was amazing. Pasta was al dente, very hard to find these days, and the pasta sauce had a nice spice as well. Salad was super refreshing and they don‚Äôt skimp on the toppings. Very good portion sizes for the price. Will definitely come back!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Jordan
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and wings with a fantastic twist.

detailedReviews.author: Elevate Yourlife
detailedReviews.text: Amazing place, loved the paneer pizza, veg pasta, salad, paneer Tikka skewers. Taste was super good.  Wewill visit again.

detailedReviews.author: Rakshak Ravichandran
detailedReviews.text: vegan roasted chicken pizza was good! served on a flatbread dough, and was seasoned well.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Alsop
detailedReviews.text: This is one of the best restaurants in Allen! The combination of Indian flavor with pasta or pizza is so delicious. The family that owns it is kind, welcoming, and courteous. I highly recommend this restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Welp
detailedReviews.text: This is the best restaurant!! The food was amazing and the service was wonderful! We hosted a family birthday party in the back event room and had a marvelous time! You will want to visit again and again!

detailedReviews.author: M B
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing! Went in on Sunday, April 6th 2025, 3:30PM. I ordered the veggie pizza and the toppings along with crust were delicious!  All toppings were fresh, flavorful and expertly crisped. The ripe tomatoes, asiago cheese, pesto, paneer and naan crust were the standout items (for me).

Additionally, the lady at the front brought my pizza out to the car‚Äîwhich was courteous for my takeout order. I‚Äôll be back. The food is so tasty and the hands of the cooks are blessed! Please come check them out, y‚Äôall!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Rickard
detailedReviews.text: We love trying new places - and Far East Pizza Co didn‚Äôt disappoint! Food was prepared great, tasters great, and owners were lovely.  Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Fire K
detailedReviews.text:
I don't think I can do this place justice in a simple Google review. The flavors are amazing.
Dining inside on a Friday afternoon was lovely due to the lack of customers. A few people stopped in for takeout orders, but otherwise it was quiet. I tried the Chicken Seekh Meatball sandwich and Vadilal Pistachio ice cream the first time I went. Then I tried the Tikka Tok pasta via Foodsby from my office lunch options. The foods are amazing. The flavors when combining these two cuisines (northern Indian and Italian) are genius and lovely.
I highly recommend giving them a try if you haven't already!

detailedReviews.author: Grace Bayona
detailedReviews.text: I live pizza and I love Indian food... This place is a new favorite! The flavor-rich options, vegetarian and vegan too, makes each visit a new experience to look forward to. Plus they have happy hour from 2-7. MUST TRY!

detailedReviews.author: Bharghav Rama Moorthy
detailedReviews.text: Great fusion restaurant to have your palates refreshed with Indian and Italian with a little bit of wine. They were able to customize the food to our liking with added spices.

detailedReviews.author: Nandith Malapati
detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best fusion pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: Mariah Fuentes
detailedReviews.text: my 2 favorite things. Indian food and pizza. the butter chicken pizza is to delicious. I can't get enough. the owners are super friendly and the best people! don't forget the butter chicken curry and masala chai!! dip the pizza crust in the curry. I promise you won't regret it!

detailedReviews.author: Cathy Smith
detailedReviews.text:
Food is so good!  Really nice people.  They help you with the menu and service is very fast.
Will be back!!!

detailedReviews.author: Abby Munoz
detailedReviews.text: We stopped in for a casual date night and throughly enjoyed our experience! We offered the paneer skewers, wings, and the tropical paneer pizza and highly recommend all three. The service was fast and friendly - we will definitely be back! We also have ordered pizza for take out before and it was just as good.

detailedReviews.author: Harish Venkataraman
detailedReviews.text: Ordered takeout so can't really comment on the service. The pizza was good but not superlative.

detailedReviews.author: Steven Morehead
detailedReviews.text: Ordered take out. Ordered two flat bread pizzas. One beef sausage and pepperoni and one Chicken Tikka pizza. Bother were good but the chicken was amazing! Salad was great as well with the Tumeric Vinaigrette.

detailedReviews.author: Rico Hall
detailedReviews.text: Love this place. The food is amazing and the people are so friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Josh H
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was very good. Me and my co-worker ate way more than we should have. We don‚Äôt feel bloated like usual after gorging ourselves with pizza. Very friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Kami and Will Drotar
detailedReviews.text: I never know what to do with pizza crust and like idea of dipping it in chicken tikka masala. Great food!

detailedReviews.author: Tony Bartok
detailedReviews.text: Wow is all I can say. My fianc√© and I have eaten at allot of unique great places but this one is the BEST. We had the tropical chicken pizza and the citrus chili pomegranate chciken wings. So AMAZING! They have a bar and great deserts to :) welcome to the neighborhood, glad you‚Äôre here. The owners were here and very friendly and caring. What a great visit.

detailedReviews.author: Parker hutchison
detailedReviews.text:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Far East Pizza is an absolute gem! We tried the Chicken Tula pizza and the chicken skewers, and both were phenomenal. The pizza had the perfect balance of bold flavors with just the right amount of spice, and the crust was spot-on‚Äîcrispy on the outside, soft on the inside. The chicken skewers were juicy, flavorful, and cooked to perfection. You can tell they put a lot of care into their ingredients and preparation. Friendly service and a great atmosphere made the experience even better. Highly recommend‚Äîcan‚Äôt wait to come back!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley V
detailedReviews.text: Ate dinner here last night and got the butter chicken & veggie pizza both on naan! They were 10 inches and honestly the perfect size for an individual pizza. They both tasted really good as well!

detailedReviews.author: Aarti Gautam
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza's! I tried their Veggie special pizza with pesto and it was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Gena
detailedReviews.text:
FAR EAST PIZZA CO. gets an easy 5 star rating. They do a fantastic job of providing a multicultural experience, that also gives you the option to steer your own ship. My family and I tried the Tikka Tok pasta, Butter Chicken pizza on the smaller Naan option, Butter Paneer Curry, and the Far East baked ziti. If you are looking for fresh, homemade, and vibrant red sauce, they have it. If you are looking for authentic Indian flavor, they have it.

That was my favorite part of the experience, the variety. The owner runs successful establishments and catering businesses, there is plenty of experience in the kitchen. Atmosphere is great, calm when we were there. Not much else to say, other than it is a must try! We will be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Eddie P
detailedReviews.text: Interesting Indian-Italian fusion. Everything we tried was delicious. Will definitely go again.

detailedReviews.author: Eman Saleem
detailedReviews.text: My friends and I came here a couple days ago and we ordered the butter chicken pizza, tikka tikka time pizza, butter chicken pasta, and the chicken meatball sandwich. We bought a bunch of stuff to share, and everything was amazing. The service and people there working were incredibly kind! The chef served us herself (as well as other people) and I‚Äôm glad she really cared whether or not we enjoyed it. My personal favorite was definitely the tikka tikka time pizza. Overall, a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Diana Salmeron
detailedReviews.text: We came here not knowing the pizza was Indian inspired and it turned out to be a delightful surprise. We ordered the chicken tikka skewers, tropical chicken pizza, and the butter chicken curry. The skewers were very well seasoned and chicken was tender and delicious. The pizza was very good and it had a pleasant kick with the curry pizza sauce and jalape√±os, such a great combination. The chicken curry came with rice and naan and it was good. The service was excellent and we did not wait long for the food to come out. I would definitely come back to this place.

detailedReviews.author: Vance Vaughan
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve always thought a butter chicken pizza was a great idea, and I‚Äôm glad to report it is! Pizza is a bit more expensive than chain pizza places, but it‚Äôs priced fairly when compared to Indian restaurants and the more expensive ‚Äúartisanal‚Äù pizza places. Would definitely recommend trying it out!

detailedReviews.author: Tito Blendz
detailedReviews.text: Great place Great food nice and clean

detailedReviews.author: Sandwhich Sandwhich
detailedReviews.text: Delicious, clean, and very friendly owners! The butter chicken pizza was really nice on a cold day

detailedReviews.author: Shayne Bachman
detailedReviews.text:
Maybe if the pizza was half price it would stand out

Mediocre quality ingredients, nothing special about the taste or texture of either the pepperoni or tikka pizza we had. For the price with this quality I would have expected bigger portions at least. Over $40 for two very mediocre, bland pizzas.

Maybe their other food is good but pizza is right in their name and if they can't do that well, I wouldn't bet on it. I was looking forward to the fusion and they're super local, but sadly this is a hard pass.

detailedReviews.author: Mohammad Ghousepeer
detailedReviews.text: Order veg pizza is awesome

detailedReviews.author: Alpha Wookiee
detailedReviews.text: Indian fusion done right. I come for the pomegranate chili wings and they never disappoint. As far as the pizza goes, the butter chicken pizza is where it's at, and I wouldn't skip on the mango lassi. Solid joint.

detailedReviews.author: Jenna Purcell
detailedReviews.text: The service was awful. One employee was eating in the dining room. When the waitress finally took our order after taking forever for drinks, she stood at the table and just shouted ‚Äúgo‚Äù for us to order. Food was not brought out at the same time so half the table was waiting on food. When it was finally brought out there was a hair in one of our pizzas. All the employees went into the back and we had to try to wave to get them to bring our check. They also charged $8 for cheese on the build your own pizza when there was minimal added. Too expensive for sub par food and the employees aren‚Äôt hospitable

detailedReviews.author: Yus
detailedReviews.text: Such a delicious meal! Ordered the citrus chili pomegranate chicken wings, tikka tikka time pizza, beef sausage and beef pepperoni pizza and tikka tok pasta. Every single one of these items was so good and would order again. Service was wonderful, owner and chef is so hospitable and kind. Highly recommend dining here.

detailedReviews.author: tom bao
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service. We ordered two different types of chicken wings and we loved them both. They were so crispy and tasty! The sauces that came with the wings really enhanced the flavors of the chicken. We also ordered three different types of pizzas and we enjoyed them all. We will definitely come back. Oh, our son also got a complimentary mango ice cream for his birthday and it was a hit with everyone in our family!

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Brown
detailedReviews.text: This food is AMAZING!!!! Last time I got the butter chicken pizza, this time I got the chili coriander chicken wings & I am SO EXCITED to try them!!!

detailedReviews.author: Terri Martinez
detailedReviews.text:
The service is great and the people who own it are the sweetest... but the FOOD!! So so good!!
The Veggie Pizza is the best I've ever had and the Butter Paneer Pasta was INCREDIBLE!

detailedReviews.author: Hemang Patel
detailedReviews.text: The veggies pizzas were delicious with the perfect crisp. Overall a great experience.

detailedReviews.author: Russell Duckworth
detailedReviews.text: What a great evening! We‚Äôll definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Valleau
detailedReviews.text: They are a new restaurant in Allen, TX. Fusion of Indian and a little Italian pizza flare. Screaming good. Not overly spicy either. Butter chicken, chicken meatballs, crispy chicken wings with mango chutney. Dude!! So good!! Vegetarian pizza s an option as well. Coming back ASAP

detailedReviews.author: Emily Wesson
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I stopped by on a weekday afternoon to pick up a pizza - super clean location, friendly and relaxed service! I only wanted to try a quick bite before we left the parking lot, but... well, we accidentally ate the whole thing on the way home. This is something special! The butter chicken pizza was amazing... I keep thinking about it, hours later. It's way off our typical routes, but we'll definitely be back to try the rest of the menu!

detailedReviews.author: Katie McDonald
detailedReviews.text: We decided to try out Far East Pizza Co. today and was pleasantly surprised! We tried the Tropical Chicken Pizza, Butter Chicken Pizza, Tikka Tikka Wings, and Meatball Chicken Sandwich. All were really good but if I had to recommend a dish it would have to be the Tropical chicken pizza. It was a great blend of flavors and really delicious! The chef/owner came out to talk to us and told us the story of how Far East Pizza came to be, she was very personable! If you‚Äôre in Allen and want to try something new I would definitely recommend supporting them!

detailedReviews.author: Gunjan gupta
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza with desi twist. Trying to put my nostalgic feeling of yummy pizza into words.
After very long time My family ate without talking to  each.other. Everyone was relishing the taste of yummy panner pizza and vegetable pizza.. Thin crust was crunchy and taste of pesto was perfect.
Must try.. as I bet no one can eat here just once.
Couldn't take pics as was busy eating...
We ate in car as they are following covid precautions...

detailedReviews.author: Charles Boltas
detailedReviews.text:
Whoa whoa whoa... I wish I would have discovered this place sooner. I thought it was just a pizza joint.  Turns out, their salads are BOMB!

I ordered the Hello Dahli salad from my work's food delivery app. Salad came packaged well and on time.

Their salads are visually stunning! See my photos.

Their pesto has such a depth of flavor and it was one of the best unique salads I've ever tried.

I will 100% eat here again and I can't wait to try something else on the menu.

detailedReviews.author: Sakina Ismaelbay
detailedReviews.text: It was our first time and the food was good. However, manager needs to be more considerate in the way he behaves. He greeted all the customers except my family. Definitely not the way I expect to be treated.

detailedReviews.author: Megha Gupta
detailedReviews.text: Best desi pizza in town!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Carson
detailedReviews.text: Innovative culinary fusion with high quality ingredients resulting in delicious food.  I've patronized multiple times and never regretted it!

detailedReviews.author: Tasty wanderer
detailedReviews.text: I recently visited Far East Pizza and was thoroughly impressed with both the food and ambiance. The Butter Paneer Pizza was a standout, combining rich, creamy paneer with a perfectly crispy crust. Equally impressive were the Paneer Tikka Skewers, offering a delightful mix of spices and tender, flavorful paneer. The Tikka Tikka Chicken Wings were a hit, with their smoky and spicy kick leaving a lasting impression. Chef Nidhi‚Äôs Butter Chicken Curry was a highlight, featuring a delectable, buttery sauce that paired perfectly with the naan. Don‚Äôt miss the Ice Cream Bu√±uelo for dessert‚Äîa unique and indulgent treat. Wash it all down with the refreshing Pomegranate Lemonade. The restaurant's modern and cozy ambiance complements the exceptional food, making it a fantastic spot for a memorable meal. Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Kush Patel
detailedReviews.text: I recently dined at this fantastic pizza place and was thoroughly impressed by their offerings. The Paneer Tikka Skewers were a flavorful start, with perfectly seasoned and grilled paneer. Both the Butter Paneer Pizza and Tropical Paneer Pizza were outstanding, each with a unique and delicious blend of flavors that made them stand out. The Butter Paneer Pasta Alfredo was equally exceptional, creamy, and rich, complementing the other dishes beautifully. Everything was incredibly well-prepared and bursting with taste. I highly recommend trying these items if you get the chance!

detailedReviews.author: Erik Jones
detailedReviews.text:
Visited Far East Pizza tonight and throughly enjoyed it. The butter chicken pizza was excellent as was the pasta primavera. The pasta would rival the taste of many high-end Italian restaurants. The owners are also very friendly and accommodating.

Clean atmosphere and excellent food. Highly recommended and is worth the drive to try even if you don't live near Allen.

detailedReviews.author: Ravi S
detailedReviews.text: Excellent family run restaurant, food was fantastic - we got the fusion pizzas, wings and paneer skewers - delicious!

detailedReviews.author: ashmeet sethi
detailedReviews.text:
I highly recommend this place for vegans and vegetarians too. Simply loved the fusion food here.
Highly recommend the following
Butter Paneer Pasta
Virgin Mango
Roasted chicken vegan pizza ( if you are not looking for a lot of spices and want something simple and nice, this one is for you)
Pomegranate lemonade

detailedReviews.author: Braylon Winston
detailedReviews.text: They've got the best pizza and the owners are fantastic people. The Butter Chicken pizza keeps bringing me back in!

detailedReviews.author: Anand Bajoria
detailedReviews.text: This place has really amazing food and amazing service.Make sure to try their speciality pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Tasneem Kagalwalla
detailedReviews.text:
I'd been meaning to go here since they opened about 3 months ago. After all, they had 2 buzz words that hit the right spot. 1. PIZZA n 2. HALAL.
And they did not disappoint. Warm n hospitable staff with yummy pizza and other delights on the menu. The veg n chicken pizza were my favs along with their tikka wings n paneer. The pomegranate lemonade was perfect for this weather!  Lovely evening at Far East Pizza & Co.

detailedReviews.author: RadioAzad
detailedReviews.text:
What a lovely fusion Indian/Italian Halal eatery! The wings are so succulent and juicy and we loved the Tikka Tikka flavor!

The pizzas are crispy and delicious!

The pomegranate lemonade is a must have and the pistachio and mango ice creams are so so GOOD we ordered two helpings of each!!

detailedReviews.author: Nitesh Srivastava
detailedReviews.text: Far east pizzeria as won us over twice - first with their fresh, healthy, and homemade-style catering, and again with their flavorful and aromatic Indian food during my dine-in visit. A great spot for Indian cuisine and pizza under one roof!

detailedReviews.author: Winston Henvey
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food with great service

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Garrett
detailedReviews.text: If you're looking for a unique fusion cuisine that actually works, this is the place to go!! Their pizza and wings are unique and delicious, plus the owner is super friendly! I have gone here multiple times since they opened and I can definitely say I'm a regular

detailedReviews.author: ahmed ebrahim
detailedReviews.text: Food was really delicious and very prompt service ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Maria McReynolds
detailedReviews.text: The food, service & atmosphere here was outstanding. Highly recommended my kids also approved.

detailedReviews.author: shri balachandran
detailedReviews.text: Lovely pizza and service. But pricey. Met the charming owners as well.

detailedReviews.author: Karthik Naidu
detailedReviews.text: you get the authentic curry tase with th pizza. Nice fusion, must try arr tgeir tandoor wings

detailedReviews.author: Mustafa Kothawala
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and wings here are great. I love the Indian fusion flavors. The tikka pizza and the tropical pizza were a hit with my family. I definitely will come here again and recommend this restaurant if you want some tasty pizzas that aren‚Äôt your typical flavors.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the unique and delicious fusion of Indian and Italian flavors, particularly the naan-based pizzas and innovative toppings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The exceptional and personalized customer service, including staff going above and beyond to accommodate special requests, leaves a lasting impression on diners. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The clean and inviting atmosphere, combined with eye-catching decor and pleasant background music, creates a memorable dining experience. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor service and food quality (e.g., rancid chicken, hair in food, unfriendly staff) - review management can address this concern
Perception of high prices for the quality and quantity of food offered - social media marketing can improve this area
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, as some customers felt neglected or not properly greeted - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Yessenia Puga
positive.text: We cannot express how grateful and thankful we are for you all. We had catering done for our wedding and gender reveal and absolutely consider this place to be very special to us. Food was amazing and both owners and staff went above and beyond for us. Thank you again!

positive.author: Avneesh
positive.text: Very good pizza! Staff is very nice and the place is very clean. They also offer tiffin catering which tastes great and is a very good price!

neutral.author: Nitin Sharma
neutral.text: Overall all good has good taste, but is pricey for the quantity. Attached picture is of butter chicken dish for $16. Not worth it in my opinion.

neutral.author: Sakina Ismaelbay
neutral.text: It was our first time and the food was good. However, manager needs to be more considerate in the way he behaves. He greeted all the customers except my family. Definitely not the way I expect to be treated.

negative.author: saikumar nalla
negative.text: Ordered chicken tikka pizza and veggie spectacular. Loved the veggie spectacular and 2 * rating is for that and chicken tikka pizza chicken was rancid(cooked multiple times smell)..can‚Äôt believe I spend $22 on it‚Ä¶would recommend to try veggie but not chicken. Disappointed!!

negative.author: Shayne Bachman
negative.text:
Maybe if the pizza was half price it would stand out

Mediocre quality ingredients, nothing special about the taste or texture of either the pepperoni or tikka pizza we had. For the price with this quality I would have expected bigger portions at least. Over $40 for two very mediocre, bland pizzas.

Maybe their other food is good but pizza is right in their name and if they can't do that well, I wouldn't bet on it. I was looking forward to the fusion and they're super local, but sadly this is a hard pass.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
